addSupportedToken(address).details: Add a token to the supported list (only owner can call)

params._token: The address of the token to add

getAvailableEthTips().details: Get tips available for withdrawal by msg.sender (ETH only)

getAvailableTokenTips(address).details: Get token tips available for withdrawal by msg.sender

getTotalEthTips(address).details: Get total ETH tips received by a streamer

returns._0: Total amount of ETH tips received

getTotalTokenTips(address,address).details: Get total token tips received by a streamer for a specific token

returns._0: Total amount of token tips received

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendEthTip(address,string).details: Send an ETH tip to a streamer

params._message: Optional message to include with the tip
params._streamer: The address of the streamer receiving the tip

sendTokenTip(address,address,uint256,str.details: Send a token tip to a streamer

params._amount: The amount of tokens to tip
params._message: Optional message to include with the tip
params._streamer: The address of the streamer receiving the tip
params._token: The address of the token to tip with

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawEthTips().details: Withdraw ETH tips received by the streamer

withdrawTokenTips(address).details: Withdraw token tips received by the streamer

params._token: The address of the token to withdraw
